medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Pain began yesterday morning; described as bandlike and constant with associated nausea, no emesis. Pain was unrelieved by ibuprofen. Pt concerned pain was related to heart.
medical_history.past_medical_history: HTN, HLD, Gallstones, Right Eye Blindness due to possible prior CVA
medical_history.family_history: Son sudden cardiac death; other sons have stents or are on plavix; father had MI.
